app.title: Remind Me PWA - Your Personal Reminder Assistant
app.description: A simple and elegant reminder app to help you stay organized

hero.title: Stay Organized,
hero.description: Set reminders effortlessly with our cute crab friend. Stay organized, never miss important moments, and bring joy to your daily routine.

manage.title: Create & Manage
manage.description: Easily create, edit, and delete reminders with a beautiful, intuitive interface.

due.title: Due Dates & Times
due.description: Set specific due dates and times so you never miss an important deadline.

filtering.title: Smart Filtering
filtering.description: Filter reminders by All, Active, or Completed to focus on what matters now.

pwa.title: PWA Support
pwa.description: Install on any device and use it just like a native app‚Äîworks offline too!

offline.title: Local Storage
offline.description: Your data stays on your device with automatic local storage persistence.

privacy.title: Overdue Alerts
privacy.description: Never miss a deadline with prominent overdue reminder highlighting.

cta.subtitle: Free forever ‚Ä¢ No sign-up required ‚Ä¢ Start immediately

features.title: Features You'll Love
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your reminders

right.title: Create reminders in seconds
right.description: Set a title, choose a due date, and you're done. Remind Me handles the rest.

pricing.title: Completely Free, Forever
pricing.subtitle: 100% open source, no hidden fees, no ads.
pricing.label: Everything you need to get started

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions about Remind Me? Here are answers to the most common questions.

pwa.q: What is a Progressive Web App (PWA)?
pwa.a: A PWA is a web application that can be installed on your device and works like a native app. Remind Me is a PWA, so you can install it on your phone, tablet, or computer and use it offline.

offline.a: Yes, all data is stored locally and works offline.

storage.a: Stored in your browser's local storage, never uploaded to servers.

install.q: How do I install Remind Me on my phone?
install.a: Use your browser's 'Add to Home Screen' feature to install with one tap.

free.a: Yes, completely free and open source, with no ads.

contribute.q: Can I contribute to the project?
contribute.a: Absolutely! Check out our GitHub repository to see the development plan, submit issues, or create pull requests. We welcome contributions!

final_cta.title: Ready to never forget again?
final_cta.description: Join thousands of happy users who trust us to help them stay organized.

empty.title: No reminders yet
empty.description: Add your first reminder to get started!

delete.title: Delete Reminder
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder? This action cannot be undone.

tags.title: Tag Management
tags.empty: No tags yet. Create your first tag!

delete_confirm.title: Delete Tag
delete_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? Reminders using this tag will keep the tag reference, but the tag will no longer be available for selection.

no_data_collection.label: No data collection.
no_data_collection.text: We do not collect, sell, or share your data.

local_storage.label: Local-only storage.
local_storage.text: Reminders are stored in your browser storage on this device.

offline_first.label: Offline-first.
offline_first.text: The app works without a server and does not require an account.

device.label: "Device"
device.text: means the phone, tablet, or computer you use to access the App.

local_storage.label: "Local storage"
local_storage.text: means browser storage on your Device (e.g., localStorage).

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to Remind Me ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information when you use our Progressive Web App (PWA).

data_collection.title: Data Collection
data_collection.label: Remind Me does not collect any personal data.
data_collection.text: All your reminders and settings are stored locally on your device using your browser's local storage. We do not have access to this data, and it never leaves your device.

local_storage.title: Local Storage
local_storage.intro: We use your browser's local storage to save:
local_storage.note: This data remains on your device and is not transmitted to any server. You can clear this data at any time by clearing your browser's local storage.

information_you_provide.title: Information You Provide
information_you_provide.text: Any text you type into the App (for example reminder titles, descriptions, and dates) is saved only to your local browser storage. We do not receive or process this information.

network_requests.title: Network Requests
network_requests.text: The App is designed to work offline and does not send your reminder data to any backend service. If you choose to click external links (for example GitHub), your browser will connect to those websites and their privacy policies will apply.

no_account_required.title: No Account Required
no_account_required.text: Remind Me does not require you to create an account, provide an email address, or share any personal information. The app works entirely offline and locally.

third_party_services.title: Third-Party Services
third_party_services.text: We do not use any third-party analytics, tracking, or advertising services. The app does not make any network requests to external services.

data_retention.title: Data Retention & Deletion
data_retention.text: Your data remains on your device until you delete it. You can delete reminders within the App, or remove all data by clearing the site's data in your browser settings. Uninstalling the PWA may also remove stored data depending on your browser/device.

security.title: Security
security.text: Because data is stored locally, security depends on your device and browser. We recommend keeping your device OS and browser up to date, and enabling device-level security (PIN/biometrics) if available.

children_privacy.title: Children's Privacy
children_privacy.text: The App is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children, and the App does not require accounts.

international_users.title: International Users
international_users.text: The App runs entirely on your device. Because we do not operate a server for your reminder data, we do not transfer your reminder content internationally.

open_source.title: Open Source
open_source.text: Remind Me is open source software. You can review our code to verify our privacy practices:
open_source.github_aria: Open GitHub repository in a new tab

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions or concerns, you can contact us here:
contact.github_aria: Open GitHub issues in a new tab

summary.title: Summary
summary.data_control: You control your data (stored locally on your device).

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using Remind Me ("the App"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the App.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.text: You may use the App if you are legally capable of forming a binding agreement in your jurisdiction.

description.title: Description of Service
description.text: Remind Me is a free, open-source Progressive Web App (PWA) that helps you manage reminders and tasks. The App works offline and stores all data locally on your device.

license.title: License
license.intro: Remind Me is released under the MIT License. This means you are free to:
license.use_any_purpose: Use the App for any purpose
license.copy_modify: Copy and modify the source code
license.mit_aria: Open MIT License in a new tab
license.github_aria: Open GitHub repository in a new tab

user_responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
user_responsibilities.backup: Backing up your own data (reminders are stored locally)
user_responsibilities.laws: Using the App in accordance with applicable laws
user_responsibilities.security: Maintaining the security of your device

acceptable_use.title: Acceptable Use
acceptable_use.text: You agree not to misuse the App. For example, you must not attempt to interfere with the App's operation, or use it in a way that violates laws or third-party rights.

data_storage.title: Data Storage
data_storage.text: All data is stored locally on your device. We do not provide cloud backup or synchronization services. If you clear your browser data or uninstall the App, your reminders will be lost. We recommend regularly backing up important information.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.text: The App is open-source under the MIT License. Any trademarks, logos, or branding may be subject to their respective owners' rights.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.text: THE APP IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE DO NOT GUARANTEE THAT THE APP WILL BE ERROR-FREE, UNINTERRUPTED, OR MEET YOUR SPECIFIC REQUIREMENTS.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.text: IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES, OR OTHER LIABILITY ARISING FROM THE USE OF THE APP. THIS INCLUDES, BUT IS NOT LIMITED TO, MISSED REMINDERS OR LOST DATA.

termination.title: Termination
termination.text: You may stop using the App at any time. These Terms remain effective to the extent necessary to cover disclaimers, limitations of liability, and other provisions that by their nature should survive.

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.text: These Terms are intended to be interpreted in a manner consistent with applicable law. If any provision is found unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in effect.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For questions about these Terms of Use, contact us here:
contact.github_aria: Open GitHub issues in a new tab
